Description: ProdPad is product management software that helps product managers develop product strategy.
Name: ProdPad

Methods.Name: Create Company
Methods.Description: Creates a new company.

Methods.Name: Get Company
Methods.Description: Get a company by ID.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Companies
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of companies associated to the account updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Get New Companies
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of companies associated to the account created since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Company List
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of companies associated to the account.

Methods.Name: Update Company
Methods.Description: Updates a company.

Methods.Name: Get User Story
Methods.Description: Get user story by ID.

Methods.Name: Get Updated User Stories
Methods.Description: Gets list of updated user stories since last run.

Methods.Name: Get New User Stories
Methods.Description: Gets list of new user stories since last run.

Methods.Name: Get User Stories By Idea
Methods.Description: Gets a list of user stories by Idea ID.

Methods.Name: Get User Stories List
Methods.Description: Gets a list of user stories.

Methods.Name: Get Persona List
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of personas associated to the account.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Personas
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of personas associated to the account updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Get New Personas
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of personas associated to the account created since last run.

Methods.Name: Get New Tags
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of tags associated to the account created since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Tags
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of tags associated to the account updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Tag List
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of tags associated to the account.

Methods.Name: Get Votes List
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of votes associated to the account.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Ideas
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of ideas associated to an account updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Idea
Methods.Description: Retrieves an  ideas by ID.

Methods.Name: Update Idea
Methods.Description: Update an idea.

Methods.Name: Get Ideas List
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of ideas associated to an account.

Methods.Name: Get New Ideas
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of ideas associated to an account since last run.

Methods.Name: Create Idea
Methods.Description: Creates an idea.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Job Roles
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of job roles associated to the account updated since last run.

Methods.Name: Get New Job Roles
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of job roles associated to the account created since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Job Roles List
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of job roles associated to the account.

Methods.Name: Get Users List
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of users associated to the account.

Methods.Description: Creates a user.

Methods.Description: Fetches a list of statuses associated to the account.

Methods.Description: Fetches a list of statuses associated to the account created since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Statuses
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of statuses associated to the account updated since last run.

Methods.Description: Fetches a list of products associated to the account updated since last run.

Methods.Description: Fetches a list of products associated to the account.

Methods.Description: Fetches a product by ID.

Methods.Name: Get New Products
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of products associated to the account created since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Roadmap
Methods.Description: Fetches a roadmap by ID.

Methods.Name: Get New Roadmaps
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of roadmaps associated to the account that have been created since last run.

Methods.Name: Get Roadmaps List
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of roadmaps associated to the account

Methods.Name: Get Roadmaps By Product
Methods.Description: Fetches a list of roadmaps associated to the product.
